titles.title: A bill to continue until January 1, 1991, the present exclusion of bicycle component parts which are not re-exported from the exemption from the customs laws otherwise available to merchandise in foreign trade zones.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 1/8/1987--Introduced. Amends the Foreign Trade Zones Act to extend until January 1, 1991 (currently June 30, 1986) the exclusion of bicycle component parts from the exemption from customs laws provided by such Act.
